entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
